post:
Hey guys,

going to release a VPN Test!

Some informations:

Location: Netherland
Bandwith: 1000Mbps
VPN Type: PPTP

What we need from you:

* Your location
* Your ping
* Your down/upload speed (comparison with your local connection)
* Stability

If you are interested, please create a support ticket at
http://support.capsload.it/

Customer ID: VPNBeta
Your Name, Your Country

Thanks and have fun!
